What is Brahamin ? What Sastra say. I am by virtue of my family , people
saying we are Brahmins, but you will surprise to note that ther is nothing
where reserved category people are less in education or intellectual aspects.
Therefore it is advisable to leave all Evel pysichological and ego problems so
that the coming generation not suffer.

Can you tell me how much percentage are getting the reservation benifits. You
will feel ashame to find the fact and figures. We proudly tell that we are
liberal but practically many of us come to a conclusion without knowing the
fact and figures. My opinion is that due to prevailing reservation system many
Bonafide reserved category people deprived and not recognise their quantities.
We question reservation when job is concern but never agree to accept them
when any relationship or social equality questions arise. For your information
it is less than 1 percent that reserved people enjoy with respect to the job
availability. No private organisations follow the reservation policy but major
jobs are from private organisations. Further no common marit list is followed
even in government schemes. Gentlemen please review the sc st social position
in our country and I am sure you will agree with me that the large number of
people's need to be uplift becouse they are our country men and our brothers
and sisters.
